q1: How does the background removal work?
a1: We use AI algorithms to detect the main subject and remove the background. Results depend on the quality and contrast of the original image.
q2: Does it work on all images?
a2: It works best when there is clear contrast between the subject and background. Complex images may require manual touch-ups.
a3: You can download the image and use an editor for touch-ups, or re-upload a photo with better contrast.
